EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - 90 Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Lamont and Roy, Lamont – thank you so much for the referral, we truly appreciate it. If working with MBO makes sense for Roy I will make sure this referral counts towards our official referral program (since it is outside Fast Robot) so we can compensate you accordingly if and when Roy’s enrollment becomes eligible. The way the program works now, you would receive $500 once we receive 30k in billings from Roy and Roy’s first 5k in billings would be free of charge. Roy – it’s so nice to meet you via email. MBO can meet (and actually far exceed) these insurance requirements (you can view our certificate of insurance here <http://info.mbopartners.com/rs/mbo/images/MBO_Partners_Sample_COI.pdf>) but I need understand exactly what type of work you will be doing to ensure it falls under our liability policy as we have some tricky rules about engineering. Could you provide me with a detailed description of the work to be performed and the 1099 rate they are offering you so I can ensure MBO can cover it? If we are good to go on that front, then we can schedule a call and get things moving along. As I have had nothing but positive experiences with MBO for the last 5 years, I recommended he pass the contract through you to simplify his taxes and take advantage of the liability insurance and protection you offer. This has nothing to do with FastRobot's relationship with MBO, I'm just providing an introduction. I've CC'd him, and he should be able to provide more information, but I've included the insurance requirements the company wished him to sign for any 1099 work. I'd like to make sure that the MBO provided insurance would cover their requirements or that you can steer him towards whatever supplemental insurance he'd need. 6.2 Consultant shall provide and maintain in full force and effect during the term of this Agreement: (a) Workers' compensation insurance in such jurisdiction in which the work is to be performed with limits required by law of an employer, and employers' liability insurance with minimum limits of $100,000.
